meta_description: The {container} package provides an enhanced version of base R's list. Version 1.1.0 adds new extract and replace operations for interactive use to both match base R's list behavior more closely and to introduce new convenient features beyond that.

convenient features beyond that.

The {container} package provides an enhanced version of base R’s list. Version 1.1.0 adds new extract and replace operations for interactive use to both match base R’s list behavior more closely and to introduce new convenient features beyond that.
